items.sentence: I thought Tom would do most of the driving. I didn't expect to have to do so much driving myself.
If you'd spend less time talking and more time working, we could get this done much more quickly.
A fault common to scientists is mistakenly believing that every problem has a technical solution.
Mary feinted a strike to Tom's face, but then swiftly struck his torso with the tip of her sabre.
Life would be terribly monotonous and deadly boring if everyone felt, thought and spoke the same.
